Author: davidw
Content: This is a calculation that depends entirely on your circumstances.  As a startup, you want to get the best product out to as many people as fast as possible, 7 years in the future be damned.  Other circumstances (such as being a big corporation) demand more attention to other aspects such as maintainability.

Author: staunch
Title: Good Automatic FAQ Style User Support Software?
Content:
I want to build up a strong FAQ page so I don't have to repeatedly answer the same questions and users can help themselves. I like what FAQ-O-Matic[1] does, but it's an old, ugly, and creaky program at this point. I'm tempted to write my own, but not if there's some good out there. Anyone know of something nice?

1. http://faqomatic.sourceforge.net/fom-serve/cache/427.html
